Name.BusinessNameLine1: JEWISH FEDERATION OF THE BERKSHIRES INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO BUILD A STRONG AND UNIFIED JEWISH COMMUNITTY IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE WELL-BEING AND CONTINUITY OF THE JEWISH PEOPLE IN BERKSHIRE COUNTY AND ITS ENVIRONS, IN ISRAEL AND THROUGHOUT THE WORLD. THE FEDERATION, AS A VOLUNTEER ORGANIZATION PURSUES ITS MISSION THROUGH FUNDRAISING, COMMUNITY- WIDE PROGRAMMING SUPPORTING JEWISH EDUCATION AND SOCIAL SERVICES, DEVELOPING LEADERS, ADVOCATING FOR SOCIAL ACTION INITIATIVES, FOSTERING COMMUNICATION AND COOPERATION AMONG JEWISH ORGANZIATIONS AND BY BUILDING STRONG RELATIONSHIPS WITH ISRAEL AND THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO BUILD A STRONG AND UNIFIED JEWISH COMMUNITTY IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE WELL-BEING AND CONTINUITY OF THE JEWISH PEOPLE IN BERKSHIRE COUNTY AND ITS ENVIRONS, IN ISRAEL AND THROUGHOUT THE WORLD. THE FEDERATION, AS A VOLUNTEER ORGANIZATION PURSUES ITS MISSION THROUGH FUNDRAISING, COMMUNITY- WIDE PROGRAMMING SUPPORTING JEWISH EDUCATION AND SOCIAL SERVICES, DEVELOPING LEADERS, ADVOCATING FOR SOCIAL ACTION INITIATIVES, FOSTERING COMMUNICATION AND COOPERATION AMONG JEWISH ORGANZIATIONS AND BY BUILDING STRONG RELATIONSHIPS WITH ISRAEL AND THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE.
IRS990.Description: THE FEDERATION PROVIDES A SOURCE OF FUNDS TO BE ALLOCATED TO ORGANIZATIONS WHOSE PROGRAMS ARE DEEMED WORTHY BY THE BOARD

Activity2.Description: BERKSHIRE JEWISH VOICE - PUBLICATIONS TO PROVIDE JEWISH COMMUNITY WITH TIMELY NEWS.

Activity3.Description: OLDER ADULTS PROGRAM - TO PROVIDE NOURISHING MEALS TO OLDER ADULTS ALONG WITH THE SOCIALIZATION THE ACTIVITY PROVIDES TO NEEDY CITIZENS AT LEAST 2 DAYS PER WEEK.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990, PART II, LINE 4D - OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES DESCRIPTION - SENIOR ADULT ACTIVITIES - RECREATIONAL, EDUCATIONAL, SEMINARS, GUEST SPEAKERS AND LUNCH PROGRAM SOCIAL WORKS PROGRAM - PROVIDE SOCIAL WORKER ASSISTANCE TO NEEDY CITIZENS ------------------------------------------------------------------------- - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 11 - FORM 990 REVIEW PROCESS - EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL BE PROVIDED WITH A COPY OF FORM 990 PRIOR TO A SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING SO THAT IT CAN BE REVIEWED IN DETAIL. BOARD MEMBERS WILL THEN DISCUSS ANY QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS ANY OR MORE MEMBER(S) MAY HAVE. MEMBERS WILL THEN VOTE TO ACCEPT THE RETURN FOR FILING OR REFER IT BACK TO THE PREPARER FOR REVISION, IF REQUIRED. ------------------------------------------------------------------------- - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 19 - OTHER ORGANIZATION DOCUMENTS PUBLICLY AVAILABLE - THE ORGANIZATION MAKES KNOWN PUBLICLY THAT THIS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
